Name: tgrelid
Description: The table this trigger is on

Name: tgname
Description: Trigger name (must be unique among triggers of same\n table)

Name: tgenabled
Description: Controls in which \n session_replication_role modes the trigger fires. O = trigger fires in "origin" and "local" modes, D = trigger is disabled, R = trigger fires in "replica" mode, A = trigger fires always.

Name: tgisconstraint
Description: True if trigger is a "constraint\n trigger"

Name: tgconstrname
Description: Constraint name, if a constraint trigger

Name: tgconstrrelid
Description: The table referenced by a referential integrity\n constraint

Name: tgconstraint
Description: The pg_constraint entry\n owning the trigger, if any

Name: tgdeferrable
Description: True if constraint trigger is deferrable

Name: tginitdeferred
Description: True if constraint trigger is initially deferred

Name: tgnargs
Description: Number of argument strings passed to trigger\n function

Name: tgargs
Description: Argument strings to pass to trigger, each\n NULL-terminated
